  • メソッド
org.aiwolf.common.data

インタフェース Player

  • 既知の実装クラスのリスト:
    AbstarctRoleAssignPlayer, AbstractBodyGuardPlayer, AbstractMediumPlayer, AbstractPlayer, AbstractPossessedPlayer, AbstractSeerPlayer, AbstractVillagerPlayer, AbstractWerewolfPlayer, SampleBodyGuardPlayer, SampleMediumPlayer, SamplePossesedPlayer, SampleRoleAssignPlayer, SampleSeerPlayer, SampleVillagerPlayer, SampleWereWolfPlayer

    public interface Player
    Player for AI Wolf
    Implements Player to create Agent for AI Wolf
    作成者:
    tori

    • メソッドの概要

      メソッド 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      Agent attack()
      Decide agent who to be attacked by wolves
      void dayStart()
      Called when the day started
      Agent divine()
      Decide agent to divine by Seer
      void finish()
      Called when the game finished.
      java.lang.String getName()
      get player name
      Agent guard()
      Decide agent to guard by BodyGuard
      void initialize(GameInfo gameInfo, GameSetting gameSetting)
      Called when the game started
      java.lang.String talk()
      Each player can talk thier opinions throw this method
      Return texts must be written in aiwolf protocol.
      void update(GameInfo gameInfo)
      Called when the game information updated
      Agent vote()
      ExecuteVote agent to execute
      java.lang.String whisper()
      Each wolves can talk thier opinions throw this method

    • メソッドの詳細

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        get player name
        戻り値:

      • update

        void update(GameInfo gameInfo)
        Called when the game information updated

      • initialize

        void initialize(GameInfo gameInfo,
              GameSetting gameSetting)
        Called when the game started
        パラメータ:
        gameInfo - information about current game status
        gameSetting - Game settings

      • dayStart

        void dayStart()
        Called when the day started

      • talk

        java.lang.String talk()
        Each player can talk thier opinions throw this method
        Return texts must be written in aiwolf protocol. When you return null, it will be ｃｏｎｓｉｄｅｒｅｄ as SKIP
        戻り値:

      • whisper

        java.lang.String whisper()
        Each wolves can talk thier opinions throw this method
        戻り値:
        aiwolf protocol based whisper

      • vote

        Agent vote()
        ExecuteVote agent to execute
        戻り値:

      • attack

        Agent attack()
        Decide agent who to be attacked by wolves
        戻り値:

      • divine

        Agent divine()
        Decide agent to divine by Seer
        戻り値:

      • guard

        Agent guard()
        Decide agent to guard by BodyGuard
        戻り値:

      • finish

        void finish()
        Called when the game finished.
        Before this method is called, gameinfo is updated with all information.
